resources.string:
We accept payment via a number of methods:

1. Our preferred method of payment is bank transfer into our account:

Sort code: 09-01-28
Account number: 89761875

2. You can pay via PayPal using our email address (dancetrix@yahoo.co.uk) as the payee.

3. You can pay via credit/debit card by calling either one of us on the numbers on the contact page (please note that there is a 3% transaction fee for this).

4. You can pay before the class is attended or goods are received in cash.

Once you have completed the transaction, please let us know with the button below.
